artist: Artist: After Pierre-Joseph Redouté; Engraver: de Gouy
dimension: 21 1/8 x 13 7/8 in. (53.66 x 35.24 cm) (sheet, trimmed within platemark)
inscription:
Signatures, Inscriptions

Engraved titles in flowing script on one line, left in Latin, right in French: [Amaryllis Lutea  Amaryllis Jaune].

Engraved plate number, UR: [148]
medium: Color stipple engraving, finished by hand
portfolio: From from Les Lillacées, vol. 3, Paris, 1802-1816
signed: Signed in plate, LL: [P.J. Redoute pinx.]; and LR; [de Gouy sculp.]
title: Amaryllis lutea
